Package com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.pto

Class PTOBalanceController

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.controller.pto.PTOBalanceController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/ptobalance") public class PTOBalanceController extends Object
This class handles all incoming HTTP requests related to an Employee's PTO Balance. It uses PTOBalanceService to perform the operations.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5
